TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, AdmFranzvonHippie said:
> 
> 
> May I have my name changed to catloverjerrygarcia?
> 

Yes.

Dear Supernovy,

I would please like to change my name.  I understand that this can be done only once.

Thank you for your consideration.

Currently, Stanley M

Dear Supernovy,

I would please like to change my name.  I understand that this can be done only once.

Currently my name is  Stanley M.  I want it to be the following:

MetricKerbalist

> Dear Supernovy,
>

>

>

Name changed. And the reason for the limit is that while it's not a big job, it does take a couple of minutes each time. If we were doing it a lot that would become a significant work load.

Hi Vanamonde,

Thank you so much for changing my name to MetricKerbalist.

Stanley

Can my name be changed to smushanoob?  

Thanks.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-06-20T18:59:12Z" title="06/20/2021 06:59  PM" data-short="3 yr">June 20, 2021</time> by Guest**

The moderation team doesn't handle account deletion, but we can escalate your request to the people above us. Unlike the moderators, they are paid staff and do not normally work on the weekend, so I don't think you'll hear from them today.

In the meantime, I've reached out to [@Vanamonde](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/27914-vanamonde/)w who can change your name. Is there a specific anodyne name that you want?

**Edited <time datetime="2021-07-23T15:19:32Z" title="07/23/2021 03:19  PM" data-short="2 yr">July 23, 2021</time> by Som-Boi\_lol**

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, Som-Boi\_lol said:
> 
> 
> Dear Vanamonde, can you please change my name to Valentin Kerman? (Valentin is my real name and its also a reference to Valentina Kerman)
> 

We try to avoid names that are too close to those of Squad staff or in-game characters ([2.2.k](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/guidelines/)). The concern is that those might be mistake for official statements. So since there is a Valentina Kerman, Valentin Kerman is not viable. Maybe some variation without the Kerman part?
